<title

>
[Brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4)
</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 284 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

The target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) until the end of your next turn.
name: Brawling
